sentence: Her panelists were Shukri Abdirahman who is running in Minnesotas 5th Congressional district, Lisa Scheller from Pennsylvanias redrawn 7th Congressional district (that includes Allentown), and former chair of the Kansas GOP, congressional candidate Amanda Adkins.
author: Fernanda Echavarri
title: TFW a TV Host Tells a White Woman That as a Hispanic She Should Speak for Hispanic Voters
